title: Gold Boarder
body: I havent got any boarder or skin and I got gold in october.

replies.body:
Reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a look at what's going on. One of our game specialists will be happy to help you from then on out.

Let me know if you have any questions.

You need to be at least gold 5 when the season ends, other wise you get silver rewards.

Alternatively your very mean in games and received a suspension, this also nullifys end season bonuses.
